channel.title: jenkins on Che-Chia Chang
channel.description: Recent content in jenkins on Che-Chia Chang

item.title: Jenkins on Kubernetes
item.description: How to deploy a cloud-native Jenkins with Jenkins X. A pipeline with Kubernetes based dynamics worker sclaing (jenkins-kubernetes). Give it a try. (Defered) Customized test reports for multiple language (ex. go-junit-report)

item.title: Jenkins X on Kubernetes
item.description: Jenkins is one of the earliest open source antomation server and remains the most common option in use today. Over the years, Jenkins has evolved into a powerful and flexible framework with hundreds of plugins to support automation for any project. Jenkins X, on the other hand, is a CI/CD platform (Jenkins Platform) for modern cloud applications on Kubernetes. Here we talk about some basic concepts about Jenkins X and provide a hand-to-hand guide to deploy jenkins-x on Kubernetes.

item.title: Jenkins X on Kubernetes
item.description: An example project to demonstrate a working pipeline with jenkins-x on Kubernetes.
